title: The Meta Quest 3 doesn’t beat my 4K TV for Xbox gaming, but I don’t care – I love it
description: After a year of waiting, the Xbox Cloud Gaming app has finally launched on the Meta Quest 3, and I love it as much as my TV.

title: This portable SSD has it all – good price, rapid speed, a range of massive capacities and military grade durability so your data is safe even if you drop it - plus, it's available in Barbie pink, if that's your style
description: The Silicon Power PX10 portable SSD offers a great balance of affordability, speed, and massive storage capacities - and it’s available in trendy pink.

title: Nothing Phone 2a leaks hint at some Galaxy S10 inspiration and a mid-range chipset
description: We've got a few more details about what the Nothing Phone 2a might look like and how it could be powered.

title: Last-minute gift ideas at Target are going fast - AirPods, Keurig, iPads and air fryers
description: Targeting is offering some incredible deals on last-minute gifts, and I'm rounding up the 15 best, including AirPods, Keurig, iPads, and air fryers.

title: Act now! 25% off the best mattress for side sleepers, this weekend only
description: Celebrate the holidays early with the Helix sitewide flash sale.

title: Strava's Year in Sport is rolling out now – it's like Spotify Wrapped for your activities
description: You can look back on everything you've done on Strava this year, as long as you're a paying subscriber.

title: This phone-sized Chromebox from the world's leading PC manufacturer saves on desk space - and can conveniently attach to the back of a new range of monitors to create an upgradeable all-in-one computer
description: Lenovo introduces the Chromebox Micro, its first micro form factor device, a compact, high-performance media player capable of supporting dual 4K displays.

title: Ricoh GR IV: 5 things I want to see
description: The rumored Ricoh GR III successor could be the street photographer’s new favorite compact camera.

title: 9 thoughtful gift ideas for home theater fans looking to upgrade their entertainment setup
description: Looking for something great to buy the movie lover in your life? We've picked out some cool gift ideas for every budget.

title: Hidden feature in Windows 11 suggests we could get the ability to uninstall AI components – and maybe even Copilot eventually?
description: Microsoft may intend to provide options to uninstall various AI components in Windows 11 (or next-gen Windows).

title: ICYMI: the week's 7 biggest tech stories, from Apple's Journal app to Galaxy Book 4
description: 2023 is nearly over, but the tech news is still flooding in. Here are all of the biggest stories of the week.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, December 16 (game #691)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
